title: Internship - Sales and Marketing in Basel
description:
Agilent Technologies is a worldwide leader in developing innovative products and technologies for life science research. Agilent supports advances in science by inventing, manufacturing, and marketing products that simplify, accelerate and improve research.

*About the Job:*
Contribute to the Agilent business in Universities by carrying out specific projects. Examples can include:
* Create Agilent instrument user lists for outbound marketing activities
* Document funding flows for publically funded research in multiple countries
* Web research or phone calls to uncover funded research projects
* Map out market participants in new business areas
* Document business opportunities in Customer Relationship Management Tool
* Generate various business reports or presentations in Excel and PowerPoint
* The tasks can be adjusted to fit your stage or thesis

At the same time, you will gain and apply knowledge about Agilent's industry, infrastructure and products in your assignment. This is developing real world experience in a company that is a leader in the markets it serves.

*Your Qualification:*
We are looking for a self motivated student or graduate with good communication skills, both verbal as well as in writing in English; French and German are an asset as well. Very good skills with Microsoft Office Suite expected as these tools are to be used very frequently. Preferably a student in Marketing or Sciences in the 3rd year of university or higher.

Internship - Sales and Marketing
(4-6 months) in Basel (Switzerland)
